title: Goat Breeds Quiz
description: From mountain climbers to milk producers, explore the wonderful world of goats

questions.question: Which goat breed from Switzerland is the most popular dairy goat in the United States, known for its white or cream-colored coat?

Which goat breed from South Africa is the most popular meat goat breed worldwide?
Which goat breed has a genetic condition that causes its muscles to stiffen when startled, making it fall over?
Which dairy goat breed is easily recognized by its extremely small or nearly absent external ears?
Which dairy goat breed has long, floppy ears and a Roman nose, and produces milk with the highest butterfat content?
Which wild goat species lives at extreme elevations in the Himalayas and Central Asia, with males sporting long, curved horns?
Which white, shaggy wild goat is native to the mountains of North America and is an expert cliff climber?
Which European wild goat species is famous for living on nearly vertical cliff faces in the Alps?
Which small dairy goat breed from Nigeria produces a surprising amount of milk for its tiny size?
What is a male goat called?
